original_text: Then they saw something that looked like many small fires. The separate fires moved and went to sit on each person there.
korean_text: 마치 불의 혀처럼 갈라지는 것들이 그들에게 보여 각 사람 위에 하나씩 임하여 있더니

sentences.original_text: that looked like many small fires
and went to sit on each person there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 거기 있는 각 사람 위에 앉으러 갔다
